name: travel-consultant-ai
description: AI-powered travel consultant website with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: TravelAI Team
